import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' import { db } from "../../firebase" import { collection, doc, getDoc, addDoc, updateDoc, serverTimestamp } from "firebase/firestore" const Comments = (props) => { const docRef = doc(db, "posts", "A6NJR0uPLAhfQ7FMFgkf") const docSnap = getDoc(docRef) return (

Hello

Back

{props.email}

{props.title}

{props.body}

{docSnap.data()}

) } export default Comments;
